lead_paragraph: Donations to charitable organizations can make a difference in your community and also reduce your tax burden. But how do you decide what to give and to which organizations, and what does it mean for your taxes? Your Money columnist Ron Lieber, reporters from The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund and social work experts gathered for an hourlong live chat to discuss the best ways to give back during the holidays.

headline.main: Q. & A.: How to Give Back During the Holidays
